Title: Prohibits the slaughter of horses for human consumption
Summary: Prohibits any person from slaughtering a horse where such person knows or has reason to know that such horse will be used for human consumption; and prohibits any person from selling, bartering, giving away, purchasing, possessing, transporting, delivering or receiving horseflesh where such person knows or should know that such horseflesh is intended for human consumption; and provides penalties for violation.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to prohibiting the slaughtering of horses for human consumption
